Description:
Did you know people are installing weight sensors in their couches to automate movie nights? Frank "Frenck" Nijhof shares some of the most creative and unexpected ways the community uses Home Assistant. From smart furniture to running entire breweries and brick factories, see how far local automation can go.

#HomeAssistant #Automation #SmartHome

Title: The wildest things people build with Home Assistant
Author: GitHub
